byline.original: By JULFIKAR ALI MANIK and NIDA NAJAR

lead_paragraph: The militant group made the statement online, but the police in Dhaka said that a homeopathic doctor had been killed and that he had reportedly been threatened by drug addicts.

headline.main: Bangladesh Police Dispute ISIS’ Claim That It Killed Shiite Preacher

snippet: The militant group made the statement online, but the police in Dhaka said that a homeopathic doctor had been killed and that he had reportedly been threatened by drug addicts.
